page.title: 05Farming in the Lavant area
page.content: In the Lavant area they mostly grow peas,oil seed rape and cereals.A few farms in our area grow grass.The farms are called Preston Farm,Langford Farm,West Lavant farm and Manor farm.Preston Farm has a great deal of hilly ground.This farm keeps a few cattle,some sheep and a few ducks.Langford Farm is mostly on hilly ground,they make silage and have a few sheep and milk about 40 cows.They grow cereals,peas and oil seed rape.West Lavant Farm grows mostly peas,grass,cereals and oil seed rape.They also make silage and hay on the Farm.At Manor Farm they have over 1000 acres.They grow cereals and peas they have four barns and no cows.Mr.Locke also have 20 sheep and some ponies.
